sub_title: Business Development, Personal Branding,Business Networking Global Authority✪Int'l Keynote Speaker✪Bestselling Author✪Founder, THE SWITCH®✪Mentor/Train Professionals➜SWITCH Relations to Referrals & Become the Authority
summary:
#𝗟𝗔𝗪𝗬𝗘𝗥 #𝗔𝗖𝗖𝗢𝗨𝗡𝗧𝗔𝗡𝗧 #𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗙𝗘𝗦𝗦𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗔𝗟➜ Want to get better in your follow up? Retain your clients? Become a rainmaker?Get more referrals? WE CAN HELP! We either train and mentor you or we do it for/with you!

► WHAT I DO: as a lawyer myself, I am known for dramatically shifting the thinking of Lawyers, accountants & consultants enabling them to generate more revenue, become the authority in their field and cultivate new business development opportunities to gain more (international), clients.
I’ve been a lawyer and consultant/mentor for over 23 years and I practice what I teach!

►HOW I DO IT: I provide keynote speaking, consulting, one-to-one mentoring, in-house workshop, and DONE-FOR-YOU services aimed at helping you to discover how to generate more revenue, without having to get more clients or spend more money on marketing/sales [even if you hate networking!].

► FREE 30 MINS PRACTICE GROWTH STRATEGY CALL: If you’re thinking, "Yes I need to talk to Itzik, I need to know some more", then book a free 30-minute Business Growth call with me: http://bit.ly/ia-call  Email me: info@itzikamiel.com.

► INTERNATIONAL KEYNOTE SPEAKER: I like to inspire audiences to action and I have been enthusiastically recognized as a sought-after dynamic, engaging and inspiring speaker. I combine in interactive way knowledge with unique how-to's and unforgettable stories and they are truly a memorable experience [*see more below*].

► BESTSELLING AUTHOR:  My first bestselling book, ‘The Attention Switch™’, is one of the leading networking books globally. It was said that the book is “Dale Carnegie super upgraded for the cyber-age”. [*see more below*].

► FOUNDER
I've founded The SWITCH™ - the largest online global professionals hub- for training, mentoring and done-for-you services to build your authority & #personlabrand; your client relationships and switch your existing relationships to Referrals, Revenue & Results [*see more below*].

company.name: THESWITCH™ ➞ Business Networking, Personal Branding, Referrals • Training, Mentoring &

profile_positions.description:
As a Business Development, Business Networking & Personal Branding Expert and Trainer, with my company THE SWITCH™ I specialize in helping professionals quickly and easily create effective new opportunities using advanced offline & online Growth strategies. I have personally trained tens of thousands of professionals on how to Switch their relations to Revenue+Referrals+Results and Grow their practice/business.

THE SWITCH™ is internationally recognized as #1 Global Business Development & leads generation Membership Community and training for Professionals, offering:
◘ online training (live webinars, videos, online events, 1-on-1 personal mentoring)
◘ offline training (keynote speaking, classroom training, 1-on-1 personal mentoring)
◘ blended, a tailor-made solution combining the above.
N.B. We focus on professionals and driven entrepreneurs.

RESULTS
☛ Implemented advanced Business development, Personal Branding & Business Networking training programs - offline, online and blended - for our professional firms, corporate and international associations clients etc. (see summary and my 100+ recommendations for more references)
☛ Helped thousands of professionals and solopreneurs to grow their business and increase leads & referrals by getting them quickly and easily new business opportunities using their (offline & online) existing connections. 
☛ A bestselling author and Authority on Business networking & Relations Capital. Internationally recognized keynote speaker about Business networking, Growth strategies, Personal Branding, and Relations Capital. I have spoken at major national and international events as well as in-company events in more than 64 countries worldwide & shared the stage with the world’s premier thought-leaders. 

Successful Growth starts with a well-crafted, personal branding profile. Download our FREE professional cheat sheet to get started TODAY:
➤ http://theswit.ch/linkedin-cheatshet

➤➤For more info & getting in touch: SUPPORT@THESWIT.CH

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT FOR LAW, ACCOUNTING & PROFESSIONAL FIRMS

profile_positions.description:
Itzik Amiel is enthusiastically recognized as sought-after dynamic, engaging and inspiring speaker on the topics of Business Networking, Power of Connections, Business Development,Referrals, Attentional Leadership,Communication for Excellence, Personal Branding & Client Engagement—delivered in keynote presentations or workshops ranging from a few hours to multiple days. 

Whether for audiences of 5 or of 50,000, Itzik engages, motivates, and inspires with his unique blend of wit, unforgettable stories and humor. Itzik’s keynote presentations, trainings and workshops combine in interactive way knowledge with unique how-to's. They are truly a memorable experience. 

Itzik is a regular keynote speaker at business events & conferences globally and he has delivered over few hundreds keynote presentations and executive briefings in more than 64 countries worldwide. 
Itzik has shared the stage with world’s premier thought-leaders including Dalai Lama, Richard Branson, Les Brown,Nick Vuijicic, Robert Kiyosaki,Mark V. Hansen

His worldwide clients include SMEs, leading global organizations, many of the Fortune 1000, leading professional firms and major international professional networks. 

Clients include:
IFA, IBA, BKR, Nexia, IR, Globalaw, MSI, TAG, TIAG, NAC, CIS Legal, Europefides, International Law and Accounting firms, Microsoft, Tata, HP, CRM Association, Global Leadership Summit, YPA, JCI, BNI, Chambers of commerce, Randstad, KPMG, PWC etc

See more REAL testimonials at: http://itzikamiel.com/testimonials/

Itzik will be happy to share his powerful message and being involved in your coming event, reach him by email to discuss your specific needs: info@itzikamiel.com or call him on +31 20 7173778 if you want:

profile_positions.title: International keynote Speaker: Business Networking • Personal Branding•Human Centered Skills

company.name: i-ZiK [itzikamiel.com] | Business Networking | Personal Branding | Clients Relationship

profile_positions.company: i-ZiK [itzikamiel.com] | Business Networking | Personal Branding | Clients Relationship
profile_positions.description:
Itzik Amiel is the Founder & CEO of Power Networking Academy™ - the #1 provider of Business Networking and Relations Capital services to individuals, companies, organizations, professionals and leading academic institutions, used by more people than any other. 
But It wasn't always so! 

Itzik authentic attention to other people during his corporate career turned into his passion for unlocking the power and the ‘Art of Attentional Networking’, through his international speaking engagements, writing, research, and consulting. 

Itzik put his prodigious energy and optimism to work, and founded the Power Networking Academy with an audacious goal: bring the power of connections and building relationships by GIVING AUTHENTIC ATTENTION to others to millions of people worldwide. 

Itzik travels the globe delivering motivational keynotes, training and workshops for many of the world's leading organizations, Individuals, professional firms and charitable organizations. 
He helps them get the best from their human assets through the power of connections.

Itzik has been featured on the India Business TV, The Marketing Tribune, Connect India Magazine, Radio Channels in South Africa, Netherlands, USA and the Caribbean, CFO magazine, CRM publications, IBA Bulletin and in dozens of professionals publications. 

Today, entrepreneurs, executives, students, and emerging talent work with Itzik to help them unearth what makes them connect with each other, attract new clients and relationships and use it to drive value for their careers and organizations, becoming influential, indispensable, and incredibly happy in the process. 
Many people have discovered that what makes them likable and connect with others with authenticity makes them successful. 

Join to Itzik’s next training or invite Itzik to train your personnel or give a keynote presentation on your next event. Remember: by giving attention to other you will get more to yourself!

www.itzikamiel.com  |   www.attentionswitch.com
profile_positions.title: Founder, Power Networking Academy™ - #1 Global training: Connections • Communication • Collaboration

company.name: The Attention Switch™ | Attention Leadership™ | Relationships Capital™

profile_positions.description:
Sub-titled "The Attention Switch – How to Pay with this Secret Ingredient to Attract,. Influence, Deeply Connect and Get the Success You’ve always Wanted” is the leading book and deep-dive instruction manual every person needs to leverage the power of authentic connection.

“The Attention Switch”  deliberately bold and brief for today’s over-worked, stressed out, multi-tasking entrepreneurs and professionals, with powerful, specific steps and fundemental Elements—and the specific frameworks—Itzik uses to reach out to deeply connect with colleagues, friends, and prospects with authentic ATTENTION.

This groundbreaking book is designed for people who are serious about building their careers, professionals who seek to better align who they are with what they do, and companies that are serious about retaining and growing the best talent. 

Ron G. Holland, Top Biz Guru and Bestselling Author of ‘Talk & Grow Rich” and “The Eureka! Enigma” said “Attention Switch is a unique and fresh approach to changing your life for once and for all, and getting ahead. Make sure you get into action and actually implement this great advice. Highly recommended."

And Prof. Paul Moorcraft, international speaker and author says, “Dale Carnegie super upgraded for the cyber age!.”

For More info or to get a copy of the LIMITED EDITION of the book and support a charity (and get a FREE GIFT] go NOW to> WWW.ATTENTIONSWITCH.COM

company.name: EyeRon™ Group ● Global Expansion ● Business Networking

profile_positions.description:
Wish you can EXPAND YOUR BUSINESS to new markets? Need to structure your international investments? Expanding to BRIC country or need a local partner? Operating GLOBALLY and want to save on your legal, tax and financial costs? Interested to form an INTERNATIONAL ALLIANCE? Going to invest or looking for INVESTMENT? 

Based on Itzik's extensive experience, for over two decades, gained as an international tax lawyer and throughout executive international business development roles in the trust and banking world, EyeRon™ Group was founded.

EyeRon Group™ is the leading company in listening to our clients needs and support and facilitate them in their international expansion, Corporate Management services, Trust, cross-border investments and their international operations, so our clients can capitalize on their strategy and overseas growth opportunities. 

Our clients include multinationals companies, start-ups, SME companies, private equity groups, venture capital firms, private individuals as well as professional firms and international associations. 

We act as one “single window” for our clients and support fully their international expansion from legal, tax, accounting and HR perspectives. Our group act across the globe, independently and with many expertises to the benefits of our clients. Our global footprint ensures that we service our client across different time zones, different cultures and different needs.

We operate in 27+ countries, with special focus on BRIC countries and emerging markets with key coordinating offices in main jurisdictions: Global | Europe: The Netherlands  Asia: India | China  Americas and LATAM: Uruguay | Brazil

How can we help you expand your business/firm and experience new success growth? Can we support your Corporate Management and trust needs?

E-mail: info@eyerongroup.com

profile_positions.description: CorpData's EntityManager™ is a web-based business process automation tool designed to help business formation and registered agent service providers to process and manage new business entities. EntityManager reduces time spent on routine tasks, reducing overhead and enabling a higher level of service. From entity formation and initial order placement to ongoing management, invoicing, and annual renewals, EntityManager helps users to keep track of critical information and respond to changes and deadlines, quickly and efficiently.
profile_positions.title: Senior member of the Advisory Board
